author: andrzejnovak
body:
### DeepDoubleCvL and DeepDoubleCvB

This PR is to integrate the two DeepDoubleC taggers following up on the integration of the DeepDoubleB tagger https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/23033 and beind adjusted for the RecoBTag/TensorFlow changes in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/23768

### Documentation
The tagger is documented in CMS DP-2018/046 as well as regular BTV talks, for example https://indico.cern.ch/event/754267/contributions/3130748/attachments/1710994/2758428/DDX_80x_update_BTV.pdf

### Testing
The tagger predictions were tested on CMSSW_10_3_0_pre2, RelValTTbar_13 sample. 
**DeepDoubleCvL** https://cernbox.cern.ch/index.php/s/Mi4CXyuw8lHNs0C
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/13226500/47123175-62c94200-d27a-11e8-8a6d-2fe75e7f34ee.png)

**DeepDoubleCvB** https://cernbox.cern.ch/index.php/s/U84clDNiKpwOEsn
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/13226500/47123146-38778480-d27a-11e8-8d38-46928a8bec44.png)
title: DeepDoubleCvL and DeepDoubleCvB tagger integration
